attributes.action: Stop the grammar school plans, every child deserves the best possible education.
attributes.additional_details:
When children are inspired and motivated to achieve their full potential and to overcome barriers in terms of low expectations by adults, they often thrive.There is a wealth of talent in the lives of children from all backgrounds and we must not invest in a few out at the expense of the majority.
My MBE and career history will confirm these facts.
References: 
Pauline Ruth. Consultant.
John Burton. Grange School
Vicky Glynn. Teacher. 
Jordan Harvey. Graduate.
Carol Stanton.Chair of governors.
attributes.background: Having worked with young people in deprived communities for over fifty years I can demonstrate that given the best opportunities many young people can achieve their full potential in academic and vocational terms: selection at eleven fails late developers and divides communities.Every child counts.
